title: Hyundai sales rise 8.5 pc in January at 67,615 units
description: Exports, however, declined by 14 per cent to 10,500 units in January as against 12,170 units in 2023. This strong growth has been fuelled by an overwhelming customer response to the newly launched Hyundai Creta, which has already garnered close to 50,000 bookings within a month opening, Hyundai Motor India COO Tarun Garg said in a statement.
